Text:
PC patch 1.2 notes:

Fixed after-match award dog tags from not loading from the profile correctly
Fixed root cause of some graphics driver crashes
Fixed particle shader causing black squares/broken shading on some graphics cards
Fixed shadering issue with underwater fog
Fixed issues with non-default controls for weapon customization
Fixed some issues with binding non-default vehicle controls

Does this crack fix the "Dx11" error?

so i tried this torrent and the scene4all torrent, same results (i know its the same torrent).

My game just doesn't run anymore lol won't even show up in the task manager. 

The task was simple so I'm sure i did it right...I posted this on scene's page as well...

I'm jus curious as to why this would happen? Only reason i wanted this update is because i thought it would fix the issue of me not getting past first level where you gotta hack the computer to open door...

LOL i really have bad luck.

@sourov
No

Since the game is made for DX11, and DX11 is a HARDWARE issue, this means they would need to re-write pretty much the hole game engine (I think), in order for the game to work with DX10.

I bought a radeon 7750 2GB for about 90$. If you care about high grafic settings you can pay abit more for the 7770 1GB which most gamers say is way better. Ofcourse, if you are running a slow CPU like a P4 dual core 3.0GHZ you might want to upgrade your CPU/mobo/mem before you spend anymore cash on a good grafic-card, else this will bottleneck you instead.

After installing this patch my game wont open only.  I had to reinstall the game again to work. So please think twice before downloading this. It turns out that the game will open but nothing happens. It does not run.
working perfect
installed crysis3, installed this update, cracked ready to play on win8
Windows Defender says CryEA.dll is malware.
So this got me into the second mission, but I've hit a problem. There's no ammo for the bolt rifle, which by watching a few youtube videos, I've seen is supposed to come fully loaded. Ideas?
I kinda wish you could edit comments.. anyway, if you run into the same problem as me above? Restart the level. Your save is still on the old version. Thank EA for that load of butt.
